extension.summary: Maraschino: Web interface to act as a nice overview/front page for my XBMC HTPC
extension.description: Maraschino is an XBMC web interface with customisable applications module providing quick access to your web interfaces (e.g. SABnzb+, SickBeard, or whatever else you want to link to), recently added episodes module, media library browser, currently playing bar and disk space module.
